description:
These archaeologist are found at a dig site near Pallet town and are led by a well known archaeologist called Eve.
The team of archaeologist are quite found of Eve and won`t hesitate to tell passers by and travelers about her acheivements.
After awakening the ancient Pokémon Gengar the entire team of archaeologists are absorbed inside Gengar`s body except Eve. However, with the help of the ancient Pokémon Jigglypuff and its song they are saved.
name: Chousadanchou
